author: Nick Statt
title: Boston Dynamics’ Spot robot is helping hospitals remotely treat coronavirus patients
description: Robot maker Boston Dynamics announced on Thursday that it’s quadruped Spot robot is already in use at one Boston hospital to help with coronavirus treatment. The company now has ambitious plans to expand use of its robots to assist healthcare workers during t…
content:
The company has ambitious plans for using robots to assist COVID-19 treatment
Photo: Boston Dynamics
Robot maker Boston Dynamics announced on Thursday that its quadruped Spot robot is already in use at one Boston hospital to help with coronavirus treatment.… [+4911 chars]
